B

backPropagateBias(Neuron) - Method in class neural_network.components.Network
Uses the bias gradients of all datapoints (for this specific Neuron) to perform gradient descent and calculate a new bias for this Neuron.
backPropagateWeight(Edge) - Method in class neural_network.components.Network
Uses the loss gradients of all datapoints (for this specific edge) to perform gradient descent and calculate a new weight for this edge.
bindBias(double) - Method in class neural_network.functions.TransferFunction
Binds the bias from the right Neuron to the TransferFunction.
bindWeights(List<Double>) - Method in class neural_network.functions.TransferFunction
Binds weights from the Edges to the TransferFunction.

C

calculatePreActivatedValue(Layer, Neuron) - Method in class neural_network.components.Network
Given a leftLayer and a rightNeuron, this calculates the activation function and value from the leftLayer and propagates this value to the rightNeuron.
call() - Method in class neural_network.data_generators.DataGenerator
Writes to the df with generated data and the specific classes or regression values (depending on whether this is for a classification or regression problem).
call(double, double) - Method in class neural_network.functions.MSELoss
This method simply returns the squared error between the two values yHat and y.

call(Double) - Method in class neural_network.functions.Softmax
The softmax function.
call(List<Double>) - Method in class neural_network.functions.TransferFunction
Implementation of the transfer function, which returns a sum of w_ij * o_j where w_ij are weights and o_j are values of Neurons in the left Layer.
call(List<Double>, int) - Method in class neural_network.functions.CrossEntropyLoss
This returns the cross entropy loss, which is the negative logarithm of the probability of the true label.
call(T) - Method in interface neural_network.functions.Activator

J

javaNeuralNetwork.main - module javaNeuralNetwork.main
Welcome to the javaNeuralNetwork module! This module contains the neural_network package, which is used for training, validating and testing a neural network for n-dimensional datapoints.
